name: Chicken Curry (Kukul Mas)
description: Classic Sri Lankan chicken curry simmered with roasted curry powder, coconut milk, and pandan leaves.

name: Fish Ambul Thiyal
description: Tangy sour fish curry from the south; goraka and black pepper give a deep, smoky sourness.

name: Dhal Curry (Parippu)
description: Red lentils tempered with mustard, curry leaves, and coconut milk — a staple comfort curry.

name: Polos Curry (Young Jackfruit)
description: Tender young jackfruit in rich roasted spices and coconut gravy.

name: Brinjal Moju (Wambatu)
description: Sweet-sour fried eggplant pickle with onions and green chilies — a festive favourite.

name: Black Pork Curry
description: Dark, peppery pork curry slow-cooked with roasted spices and tamarind.

name: Jaffna Crab Curry
description: Fiery crab curry with Jaffna curry powder and fragrant spices.

name: Prawn Curry (Isso)
description: Prawns simmered in coconut milk with turmeric, fenugreek, and curry leaves.

name: Cashew Curry (Kajju Maluwa)
description: Creamy cashew curry with coconut milk — rich and mildly spiced.

name: Pumpkin Curry (Wattakka)
description: Sweet pumpkin cubes in a gentle coconut-milk gravy, tempered with mustard and chilies.
